attributes.action: not pay out money to the family members of dead terrorists who for years murdered,injured and terrorised the people of Northern Ireland and mainland Britain
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The British Government have announced that they are considering paying £12,000 to the closest relative of all people killed as a result of the troubles in Northern Ireland. THIS INCLUDES THE FAMILIES OF TERRORISTS KILLED WHILST ON ACTIVE DUTY MURDERING AND TERRORISING POLICEMEN, SOLDIERS AND MEMBERS OF THE PUBLIC!!!
Has our government gone mad? Using tax payers money to somehow compensate people who's relatives went out to kill ordinary people going around doing their jobs. What next? A knighthood for Osama Bin Laden???
If you are as disgusted as I am please sign this petition and send it on to as many people as you know.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
